title: Wireless Headphones, Anker SoundBuds Tag In-Ear Bluetooth Earbuds Smart Magnetic Headphones with aptX Technology, CVC 6.0 Noise Cancellation, 6 Hour Playtime — Bluetooth 4.1 Headset with Mic
feature: Enjoy Better Sound: Rich bass and crystal highs are delivered via Bluetooth 4.1 and high-fidelity aptX lossless technology.
Intuitive Design: Smart-magnets power on when separated and automatically pair with last connected device.
Sweat Resistant: Innovative nano-engineering delivers robust performance in practically any environment.
A Tailored Fit: Customize your hold with multi-size EarTips and patented AirWings - engineered for superior comfort and grip.
What's In the Box: S/M/L EarTips, S/M/L/XL AirWings, FitClip, Micro USB Cable, Travel Pouch, welcome guide, our worry-free 18-month warranty and friendly customer service.
description: Tag The High-Fidelity Earbuds with Smart-Magnet Control From , the Choice of 20 Million+ Happy Users Industry-Leading Technology Worry-Free Warranty We've boosted the bass for heavyweight performance. AptX lossless technology delivers smooth, high-fidelity audio. Pull apart to turn on, clip together to turn off. SoundBuds Tag function intuitively, automatically connecting to your devices in seconds — just pull and play. Listen while jogging, or in the rain. Cutting-edge nano design means SoundBuds Tag are completely rugged, sweat resistant, and equipped for practically any environment. Fully charge in an hour and a half, and bank enough juice for the day. A 6 hour battery provides plentiful power… from your morning commute, to your end-of-day workout. Multi-sized EarTips and patented flexi-fit AirWings allow you to customize your hold. Lock in, isolate outside noise and enjoy a better audio experience. Multi-function remote allows you to manage your sounds seamlessly. In-line microphone with cVc noise cancellation makes clear, hands-free calling a breeze. At Anker, we believe in our products. That's why we back them all with an 18-month warranty and provide friendly, easy-to-reach support.
